question: The famous Chaitra Jatra festival is associated with which of the following temples of Odisha?
explanation: the famous Chaitra Jatra festival of Odisha is associated with Tara Tarini Temple. It is celebrated in Chaitra Month (March). This year\'s festival has been cancelled due to the Coronavirus outbreak. The temple is located in the Tara Tarini hills (on the bank of Rushikulya river).
